title: Killer Underwear Invasion!: How to Spot Fake News, Disinformation & Conspiracy Theories
description: A hilarious and timely tool to help kids learn how to tell what news is true and what isn'tCan peanuts give you super strength? Were unicorns discovered on the moon? Did Martians really invade New Jersey? For anyone who has ever encountered outrageous stories like these and wondered whether they were true, this funny, yet informative book breaks down what fake news is, why people spread it, and how to tell what is true and what isnâ€™t. With quirky illustrations and a humorous tone, Elise Gravel brings her kid-accessible wit to the increasingly important subject of media literacy and equips younger readers with the skills needed to interact with global news.
author: Elise Gravel
